definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: feel a loathing, abhorrence, sickening dread (‖ √of [[קוט]]; Targum [[קוּץ]] id.; for connex. of meanings cf. Aram. [[קְנַט]] loathe, qnat. fear);—

feel a loathing at, abhor, c. [[ב]] rei Nu 21:5 (JE), Ge 27:46 (P), Pr 3:11 (‖[[מָאַס ]]); c. [[ב]] pers. Le 20:23 (H ; subj. ´[[י]]:); so 1Ki 11:25, but Kit (after SyrVer, cf. LXX) prop. [[וַ֫יׇּחֶק]] (√ [[חוק]]
feel a sickening dread, c. [[מִפְּנֵי]] pers. Ex 1:12 (J), Nu 22:3 (E), Is 7:16.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 pl. sf. [[נְקִיחֶנׇּה]] Is 7:6 (sf. of Judah) let us cause her sickening dread, but weak, rd. [[נְחִיקֶנׇּה]] (√ [[חוק]]) Thes Che Du Gr Marti.— Other
